fields.description:
I built from trunk, and configured RM Ha, then I submitted a hive job.

there are total 11 maps, then I stopped active RM when 6 maps finished.

but Hive shows me all map tasks restat again. This is conflict with the design description.

fields.summary: All tasks restart during RM failover on Hive
